mapper.select: select spa.id, spa.name, spa.code, spa.description, spa.group_id "groupId", spa.sort, spa.status, spa.create_by "createBy", spa.update_by "updateBy", spa.create_time "createTime", spa.update_time "updateTime", spa.deleted from sys_permission_action spa where spa.deleted = 0 and spa.status = 1

SELECT DISTINCT spa.id, spa.name, spa.code, spa.description, spa.group_id "groupId", spa.sort, spa.status, spa.create_by "createBy", spa.update_by "updateBy", spa.create_time "createTime", spa.update_time "updateTime", spa.deleted FROM tr_user_role tur INNER JOIN tr_permission_role_menu tprm on tur.role_id = tprm.role_id INNER JOIN tr_permission_menu_action tpma on tprm.menu_id = tpma.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_permission_action spa on spa.id = tpma.action_id WHERE tur.deleted = 0 and tprm.deleted = 0 and tpma.deleted = 0 and tur.user_id = #{userId} and spa.deleted = 0 and spa.status = 1

SELECT DISTINCT spm.id, spm.name, spm.code,spm.type, spm.description, spm.parent_id "parentId", spm.url, spm.path, spm.method, spm.icon, spm.style, spm.sort, spm.cache,spm.visiable, spm.link, spm.status, spm.component FROM tr_user_role tur INNER JOIN tr_permission_role_menu tprm ON tur.role_id = tprm.role_id INNER JOIN sys_permission_menu spm ON spm.id = tprm.menu_id WHERE tur.deleted = 0 and tprm.deleted = 0 and tur.user_id = #{userId} AND spm.deleted = 0 AND spm.status = 1 ORDER BY spm.sort

select DISTINCT sr.id, sr.name, sr.code, sr.description, sr.sort, sr.status FROM tr_user_role tur INNER JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = tur.role_id WHERE tur.deleted = 0 and sr.status = 1 AND sr.deleted = 0 AND tur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT sr.api_permission FROM sys_user su INNER JOIN tr_user_role tur ON tur.user_id = su.id INNER JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = tur.role_id WHERE tur.deleted = 0 and su.`status` = 1 AND su.deleted = 0 AND sr.deleted = 0 and sr.`status` = 1 and su.id = #{userId}
